item.title: Horse Life 98
item.description: Been a while I wanted to make a webcomic, but I never got around at drawing one, and if I do I’m not that good at drawing, so… I recently started messing up with a Windows 98 VM (for various reasons, including a future redesign of this website), I re-discovered Microsoft Comic Chat, I decided to import my Pony Town avatars in it, and the rest is history. It’s simple to make, it doesn’t take too much of my attention span and it looks good, so yeah, winning formula.
